bit_field_value.name: SOSCCSR_SOSCSTEN_DISABLED
bit_field_value.description: System OSC is disabled in Stop modes

bit_field_value.name: SOSCCSR_SOSCSTEN_ENABLED
bit_field_value.description: System OSC is enabled in Stop modes if SOSCEN=1.

bit_field_value.name: SOSCCSR_SOSCLPEN_DISABLED
bit_field_value.description: System OSC is disabled in VLP modes

bit_field_value.name: SOSCCSR_SOSCLPEN_ENABLED
bit_field_value.description: System OSC is enabled in VLP modes

bit_field_value.name: SOSCCSR_SOSCERCLKEN_DISABLED
bit_field_value.description: System OSC 3V ERCLK output clock is disabled.

bit_field_value.name: SOSCCSR_SOSCERCLKEN_ENABLED
bit_field_value.description: System OSC 3V ERCLK output clock is enabled when SYSOSC is enabled.

bit_field_value.name: SOSCCSR_SOSCCM_DISABLED
bit_field_value.description: System OSC Clock Monitor is disabled

bit_field_value.name: SOSCCSR_SOSCCM_ENABLED
bit_field_value.description: System OSC Clock Monitor is enabled

bit_field.name: SOSCCMRE
bit_field.description: System OSC Clock Monitor Reset Enable

bit_field_value.name: SOSCCSR_SOSCCMRE_IRQ
bit_field_value.description: Clock Monitor generates interrupt when error detected

bit_field_value.name: SOSCCSR_SOSCCMRE_RESET
bit_field_value.description: Clock Monitor generates reset when error detected

bit_field_value.name: SOSCCSR_LK_WRITEABLE
bit_field_value.description: This Control Status Register can be written.

bit_field_value.name: SOSCCSR_LK_PROTECTED
bit_field_value.description: This Control Status Register cannot be written.

bit_field_value.name: SOSCCSR_SOSCVLD_INVALID
bit_field_value.description: System OSC is not enabled or clock is not valid

bit_field_value.name: SOSCCSR_SOSCVLD_VALID
bit_field_value.description: System OSC is enabled and output clock is valid

bit_field_value.name: SOSCCSR_SOSCSEL_NOT_SYSTEM
bit_field_value.description: System OSC is not the system clock source

bit_field_value.name: SOSCCSR_SOSCSEL_SYSTEM
bit_field_value.description: System OSC is the system clock source

bit_field_value.name: SOSCCSR_SOSCERR_NOT_ERROR
bit_field_value.description: System OSC Clock Monitor is disabled or has not detected an error

bit_field_value.name: SOSCCSR_SOSCERR_ERROR
bit_field_value.description: System OSC Clock Monitor is enabled and detected an error

bit_field_value.name: SOSCCFG_EREFS_OSC
bit_field_value.description: Internal crystal oscillator of OSC requested.

bit_field_value.name: SOSCCFG_HGO_LOW_POWER
bit_field_value.description: Configure crystal oscillator for low-power operation

bit_field_value.name: SOSCCFG_HGO_HIGH_GAIN
bit_field_value.description: Configure crystal oscillator for high-gain operation

bit_field_value.name: SOSCCFG_RANGE_LOW
bit_field_value.description: Low frequency range selected for the crystal oscillator of 32 kHz to 40 kHz.

bit_field_value.name: SOSCCFG_RANGE_MEDIUM
bit_field_value.description: Medium frequency range selected for the crytstal oscillator of 1 Mhz to 8 Mhz.

bit_field_value.name: SOSCCFG_RANGE_HIGH
bit_field_value.description: High frequency range selected for the crystal oscillator of 8 Mhz to 32 Mhz.

bit_field_value.name: SIRCCSR_SIRCSTEN_DISABLED
bit_field_value.description: Slow IRC is disabled in Stop modes

bit_field_value.name: SIRCCSR_SIRCSTEN_ENABLED
bit_field_value.description: Slow IRC is enabled in Stop modes

bit_field_value.name: SIRCCSR_SIRCLPEN_DISABLED
bit_field_value.description: Slow IRC is disabled in VLP modes

bit_field_value.name: SIRCCSR_SIRCLPEN_ENABLED
bit_field_value.description: Slow IRC is enabled in VLP modes

bit_field_value.name: SIRCCSR_LK_WRITEABLE
bit_field_value.description: Control Status Register can be written.

bit_field_value.name: SIRCCSR_LK_PROTECTED
bit_field_value.description: Control Status Register cannot be written.

bit_field_value.name: SIRCCSR_SIRCVLD_INVALID
bit_field_value.description: Slow IRC is not enabled or clock is not valid

bit_field_value.name: SIRCCSR_SIRCVLD_VALID
bit_field_value.description: Slow IRC is enabled and output clock is valid

bit_field_value.name: SIRCCSR_SIRCSEL_NOT_SYSTEM
bit_field_value.description: Slow IRC is not the system clock source

bit_field_value.name: SIRCCSR_SIRCSEL_SYSTEM
bit_field_value.description: Slow IRC is the system clock source

bit_field_value.name: SIRCCFG_RANGE_LOW
bit_field_value.description: Slow IRC low range clock (2 MHz)

bit_field_value.name: SIRCCFG_RANGE_HIGH
bit_field_value.description: Slow IRC high range clock (8 MHz )

bit_field_value.name: FIRCCSR_FIRCSTEN_DISABLED
bit_field_value.description: Fast IRC is disabled in Stop modes.

bit_field_value.name: FIRCCSR_FIRCSTEN_ENABLED
bit_field_value.description: Fast IRC is enabled in Stop modes

bit_field_value.name: FIRCCSR_FIRCLPEN_DISABLED
bit_field_value.description: Fast IRC is disabled in VLP modes

bit_field_value.name: FIRCCSR_FIRCLPEN_ENABLED
bit_field_value.description: Fast IRC is enabled in VLP modes

bit_field_value.name: FIRCCSR_FIRCTREN_DISABLE
bit_field_value.description: Disable trimming Fast IRC to an external clock source

bit_field_value.name: FIRCCSR_FIRCTREN_ENABLE
bit_field_value.description: Enable trimming Fast IRC to an external clock source

bit_field_value.name: FIRCCSR_LK_WRITEABLE
bit_field_value.description: Control Status Register can be written.

bit_field_value.name: FIRCCSR_LK_PROTECTED
bit_field_value.description: Control Status Register cannot be written.

bit_field_value.name: FIRCCSR_FIRCVLD_INVALID
bit_field_value.description: Fast IRC is not enabled or clock is not valid.

bit_field_value.name: FIRCCSR_FIRCVLD_VALID
bit_field_value.description: Fast IRC is enabled and output clock is valid. The clock is valid once there is an output clock from the FIRC analog.

bit_field_value.name: FIRCCSR_FIRCSEL_NOT_SYSTEM
bit_field_value.description: Fast IRC is not the system clock source

bit_field_value.name: FIRCCSR_FIRCSEL_SYSTEM
bit_field_value.description: Fast IRC is the system clock source

bit_field_value.name: FIRCCSR_FIRCERR_NOT_ERROR
bit_field_value.description: Error not detected with the Fast IRC trimming.

bit_field_value.name: FIRCCSR_FIRCERR_ERROR
bit_field_value.description: Error detected with the Fast IRC trimming.

bit_field_value.name: FIRCCFG_RANGE_F48MHZ
bit_field_value.description: Fast IRC is trimmed to 48 MHz

bit_field_value.name: FIRCCFG_RANGE_F52MHZ
bit_field_value.description: Fast IRC is trimmed to 52 MHz

bit_field_value.name: FIRCCFG_RANGE_F56MHZ
bit_field_value.description: Fast IRC is trimmed to 56 MHz

bit_field_value.name: FIRCCFG_RANGE_F60MHZ
bit_field_value.description: Fast IRC is trimmed to 60 MHz

bit_field_value.name: FIRCTCFG_TRIMDIV_RESERVED6
bit_field_value.description: Reserved. Writing this value will result in Divide by 1.

bit_field_value.name: FIRCTCFG_TRIMDIV_RESERVED7
bit_field_value.description: Reserved. Writing this value will result in a Divide by 1.

register.name: LPFLLCSR
register.description: Low Power FLL Control Status Register

bit_field_value.name: LPFLLCSR_LPFLLTREN_DISABLED
bit_field_value.description: Disable trimming LPFLL to an reference clock source

bit_field_value.name: LPFLLCSR_LPFLLTREN_ENABLED
bit_field_value.description: Enable trimming LPFLL to an reference clock source

bit_field_value.name: LPFLLCSR_LPFLLTRUP_DISABLED
bit_field_value.description: Disable LPFLL trimming updates. LPFLL frequency determined by AUTOTRIM written value.

bit_field_value.name: LPFLLCSR_LPFLLTRUP_ENABLED
bit_field_value.description: Enable LPFLL trimming updates. LPFLL frequency determined by reference clock multiplication

bit_field_value.name: LPFLLCSR_LK_WRITTEN
bit_field_value.description: Control Status Register can be written.

bit_field_value.name: LPFLLCSR_LK_PROTECTED
bit_field_value.description: Control Status Register cannot be written.

bit_field_value.name: LPFLLCSR_LPFLLSEL_NOT_SYSTEM
bit_field_value.description: LPFLL is not the system clock source

bit_field_value.name: LPFLLCSR_LPFLLSEL_SYSTEM
bit_field_value.description: LPFLL is the system clock source

bit_field_value.name: LPFLLCSR_LPFLLERR_NOT_ERROR
bit_field_value.description: Error not detected with the LPFLL trimming.

bit_field_value.name: LPFLLCSR_LPFLLERR_ERROR
bit_field_value.description: Error detected with the LPFLL trimming.

register.name: LPFLLTCFG
register.description: Low Power FLL Trim Configuration Register
